member.summary: Executes a query and returns a collection of objects.
member.returns: Returns a of field values specified by the wiql query and the batchReadParams collection.
member.param: A collection of objects. Each object specifies a work item ID and an optional revision. If no revision is specified, the latest revision is returned.

A query expression that specifies the fields to be placed in the result set. The query must be a work item query language (WIQL) string of the form SELECT <fields> FROM workitems. Other clauses, such as WHERE, are not supported for this method.
